title: Bayes = Blackwell, Almost. (arXiv:2302.13956v3 [econ.TH] UPDATED)
abstract: There are updating rules other than Bayes' law that render the value of information positive. I find all of them.
context:
Title: Bayes = Blackwell, Almost. (arXiv:2302.13956v3 [econ.TH] UPDATED)
Abstract: There are updating rules other than Bayes' law that render the value of information positive. I find all of them.
translated_abstract: 存在着除了Bayes'定律之外的更新规则，可以使信息的价值变为正值。我找到了所有这些规则。
tldr: 存在其他的更新规则可以使信息的价值变为正值，作者找到了所有这些规则。
